context: Preventive care of Heart& Lung diseases,
review: Great experience and satisfied. I would recommend to everyone for tyagi nursing home. Very helpful and cooperative staff.
I am 60 year old woman, and from last 2 years I m permanent patient of Dr s.k tyagi... I like his construction and he always prescribe suitable medicine. Thank you

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: came with the complaint of headache, giddiness and weakness. for which I was advised xray cervical spine, pns n eye check up. even after getting everything done ,Doctor has no explanation for my headache and on asking he said my cervical transverse process is enlarged mildly due to which I am veing pain. **** **** **** ********** ******* *** *  **** **** ** ***** **** ***** no explanation and treatment for my headache. Spent 1 hrs, 2 xrays to get a dicey opinion.  I thought investigations are for confirmation and ruling out the options. Didn't expect this from a senior Doctor.

**** **** *** ** ***** *** ******* ** ****** **** *** ******* ** *** **** **** **** * **** **** ****** ** *** **** ** *** ********* *** they wanted to admit the patient. They took 600 rs. For just advicing us to admit the patient and mean while they insert the cannula in patinets hand and took another 500 rs. for cannula But we refused to admit the patient ** ** *** **** *** **** ***  they still charged us 1100 rs. *** ******** We came out from tyagi nursing home without any firstaid and paid 1100 rs *** ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: staffat reception is fine though they are little sluggish. we waited outside doctors cabin for more than 30min even when there was no patient inside; nurse there keep telling us to wait. doctor also listen to your issues from 5ft distance (i visited doctor before Covid19 was in india.. im puting this feedback late). In very first visit doctor asked us do you have any medical policy at office. Telling to do xray of head is fine ******* **** ****** *********** but he should listen to patient problems first.

Happy costumer .. I like the patient care and the way doctor consult with patient three times a day.
Well mannered staff

main focus of Dr. Tyagi is to get all the test done from his nursing home only. he didn't even bothered to check the pulse himself or check through his stethoscope. he just listen to me from 5 feet distance and wrote number of test which he asked me to get it done from his nursing home only.

First of all the room was extremely clean and so the washroom. Dr S.K Tyagi is also really nice and generous person . Used to come everyday in the room and talked also very sweetly. Staff was also really frank and they also have a hand in the cute of the disease. Thanks a lot to all the staff.
Excellent personal care and attention. All the best.The staff has responded day and night tirelessly at all time of hospitalization.

Dr. is very polite and listen the problem completely problem before advice.
Advice few test to investigate further before start further treatment.
Completely satisfied.
